projects.title: Roblox Roleplay Game
projects.subtitle: Philippine Marine Corps Roleplay Game on Roblox
projects.description:
**Philippine Marine Corps Roleplay Game** is an immersive roleplaying experience on Roblox, developed using Lua. With a visit count of over 23,000 players, players can enlist in the Philippine Marine Corps, undergo training, and participate in various military operations and missions within a dynamic virtual environment.

Here I learned:

- Scripting complex gameplay systems in **Lua** (player progression, training flows, mission logic)
- Designing intuitive in-game UI and HUD elements
- Implementing networked multiplayer features and optimizing client-server performance
- Managing assets, animations, and visual effects for immersive feedback
- Using version control and collaborative workflows for a live game

[Game Link](https://www.roblox.com/games/110533446843258/Philippine-Marine-Corps-RP#!/about)

projects.title: Jedis
projects.subtitle: Redis-like Datastore made in Java
projects.description:
**Jedis** (Java Redis) is my attempt at replicating all features of [Redis](https://redis.io/) in Java. This project involved implementing core Redis functionalities such as data persistence, in-memory caching, and pub/sub messaging. It was a deep dive into distributed systems, focusing on performance optimization and thread-safe operations.

Key Features:
- Support for common Redis data structures like strings, hashes, lists, and sets
- Implementation of a lightweight in-memory database
- Pub/Sub messaging for real-time communication
- Thread-safe design for concurrent operations

Through this project, I gained hands-on experience with Java concurrency, data serialization, and designing scalable systems.

[Source Code](https://github.com/Coralise/Java-Redis)

projects.title: Bean's Spelling Bee Helper
projects.subtitle: Practice tool and random-word API for Roblox Bean's Spelling Bee
projects.description:
Bean's Spelling Bee Word Finder is a comprehensive spelling and typing practice tool designed for the Roblox game "Spelling Bee." It features a random-word API, custom word lists, and a WPM tracker, making it ideal for both casual practice and competitive preparation. Built with **Next.js** and **TypeScript**, the app integrates **reCAPTCHA v3** for security and offers a seamless user experience with **Tailwind CSS**.

Key Features:
- Random-word API for dynamic practice sessions
- Custom word lists for personalized learning
- Real-time WPM tracking to monitor progress
- Secure and bot-resistant with reCAPTCHA v3

This project deepened my expertise in modern web development, API design, and user experience optimization.

[Visit Website](https://robloxspellingbee.vercel.app/)

projects.title: Custom Bans Plus
projects.subtitle: Advanced Ban Management for Minecraft Servers
projects.description:
**Custom Bans Plus** is a powerful plugin for **Minecraft servers**, offering advanced tools for managing bans, kicks, and player moderation. With over **22,000 downloads**, it has become a trusted solution for server administrators seeking efficiency and customization.

Key Features:
- Intuitive GUI for managing bans and kicks
- Integration with **MySQL** for scalable data storage
- Compatibility with the **MC Spigot API** for seamless server integration
- Customizable ban messages and durations

This project honed my skills in Java development, database integration, and creating user-friendly tools for server management.

projects.title: Mandog Driving
projects.subtitle: Driver's License Exam Reviewer (Japan)
projects.description:
An **online platform** built with **Flutter** and **Google Firebase**, Mandog Driving is designed to help users prepare for Japan's driver's license exam. It features interactive tools, real-time feedback, and a user-friendly interface to ensure effective learning.

Key Features:
- Interactive practice tests with instant feedback
- Real-time progress tracking
- Cloud-based data storage for seamless access
- Optimized for mobile devices with **Flutter**

This project enhanced my expertise in cross-platform development, Firebase integration, and creating educational tools.

projects.title: MyStore
projects.subtitle: Sari-Sari (Local Convenience) Store Mobile Point-of-Sales Inventory System
projects.description:
**MyStore** is a mobile **POS inventory system** tailored for sari-sari store owners. Built with **Flutter** and **SQLite**, it streamlines inventory management and automates processes with **OCR** for receipt scanning.

Key Features:
- Inventory tracking with real-time updates
- OCR-based receipt scanning for automation
- Offline support with local SQLite database
- User-friendly interface for small business owners

This project strengthened my skills in mobile app development, database management, and implementing OCR technologies.

projects.title: UI Jobs
projects.subtitle: Minecraft Plugin
projects.description:
**UI Jobs** revolutionizes in-game economies for **Minecraft servers** by introducing interactive jobs and anti-cheat measures. It provides a fair and engaging experience for players while simplifying management for server admins.

Key Features:
- Interactive job system with rewards
- Anti-cheat mechanisms to ensure fair play
- Integration with **MySQL** and **SQLite** for flexible data storage
- Customizable job configurations

This project deepened my understanding of Java, database integration, and creating engaging gameplay mechanics.
